content: Alexandros Kapravelos · Home Publications Teaching Advice CV Contact ☰ Alexandros Kapravelos Associate ProfessorNC State University [email protected] I'm an Associate Professor in the Department of Computer Science at North Carolina State University, a member of the Wolfpack Security and Privacy Research (WSPR) Lab and the faculty mentor of HackPack. Together with The Order of the Overflow team we organized DEF CON CTF during 2018-2021. Research Interests My research interests span the areas of web security & privacy, software supply chain security, and AI security. I am in particular interested in the security and privacy problems that arise from the evolution of the web, the software supply chain and the latest advancements in AI.
